item.title: Overwatch: BEST Brigitte Playstyle - Everything You NEED to Know!

meta.summary:
b"In this guide we cover where, when and with what heroes to play Brigitte in Overwatch. We also go a bit deeper in our analysis of her kit to try and identify her best and most effective playstyle. Suffice to say, Brigitte likes to fight and fight at close quarters. This makes her the Queen of brawling as far as the support slot goes. Incredibly fun and satisfying to play, she can be absolutely devastating when used in the right way, at the right time. We hope you like the video and it contains everything you need to know to get to grips with her.

item.title: Overwatch: HUGE Brigitte NERF! - Secret Doomfist NERF?

meta.summary:
b"In this video we break down the forum post by Geoff Goodman that details a possible nerf to Brigitte's shield bash coming to the Overwatch PTR. Not being able to bully main tanks through barriers is a massive change to the game through key interactions and could herald a new meta at the pro level. Less Brig? More Tracer! For matchmaking players, Brig would still have a huge amount of value to go and get so it wouldn't delete her from the game, much to some people's either relief or regret. We also cover a potential stealth nerf to Doomfists slam from standing, which could make him that much more difficult to control. Hope you enjoy!

OUR VARIETY STREAM! https://www.fb.gg/yogaming

item.title: So, you wanna main Brigitte? | Overwatch Character Guide | Level 2 Gamers featuring TigratoPower

meta.summary:
b'Welcome to our new series "So, you wanna main...?"

In which we compile expert advise to help you get started with using a character for your *main* on Overwatch.

These guides will give an overview, go in depth on abilities, and give some useful positioning/playstyle tips to help give you a head start or to help tweak your play if you can't quite get your head around a character. 

This episode features Brigitte, the Support/Tank Hybrid that shook the meta to its core and has become the scourge of flankers everywhere. Daughter of Torbjorn and very close to Reinhardt in lore and abilities, Brigitte when properly controlled can become an overwhelming powerhouse and a nightmare to deal with. 

If you have any questions for him about anything Brigitte related or otherwise - feel free to drop them in the comments below!

If you love the series and want to see more characters...let us know who you would like to see next, we'll see if we can't make that happen!

Enjoy!

-L2G

item.title: Overwatch: Aggro Flanking Brigitte - Pro Duelist Playstyle

meta.summary:
b"A major part of Brigitte's strength is her capability to not only defend herself, but simply win 1v1s. Because of this, you can see Brigitte see a lot of use in the DPS slot playing in a duelist playstyle to either directly attack enemy damage or even flank the backline supports. Today's video we discuss the merits of going aggro into the backline especially when using Rally, which does more to enable Brigitte to chase down kills and survive herself, rather than simply armor up the team in a supportive way. If you enjoyed the video be sure to leave it a like!
